alert.note: Alert for Oswego (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Storm Watch issued February 21 at 12:34PM EST until February 23 at 6:00PM EST by NWS Buffalo
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WATCH REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM WEDNESDAY AFTERNOON THROUGH THURSDAY AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Heavy snow and mixed precipitation possible. Total snow accumulations in excess of 9 inches possible with ice accumulations of around two tenths of an inch possible. The most snow is expected over northern portions of the county, including the Tug Hill. * WHERE...Oswego county. * WHEN...From Wednesday afternoon through Thursday afternoon. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult to impossible. The hazardous conditions could impact Wednesday evening commute and the morning and evening commutes on Thursday.
info.instruction: Begin needed preparations at home or with your vehicle. Travel may become difficult, so plan accordingly.
